item.title: Season 1
item.author: info@openhwgroup.org (OpenHW Group)
item.description: OpenHW TV S01E02 Jul 16, 2020 Episode 2 of OpenHW TV gives an in-depth overview and progress to date of the CVE4 (previously RI5CY) and CVA6 (previously Ariane) cores with panelists from the OpenHW Group Cores Task Group answering questions in an interesting Q&A session at the end. View on youku.com OpenHW TV S01E01 Jun 18, 2020 We live-streamed a world class first episode of OpenHW TV on 18th June and even exceeded our registration numbers, as guest presenters from Metrics and Imperas highlighted the open source CORE-V processor IP design verification plan.
